article.title: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Center of Kansas City
article.summary: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Center of Kansas City.
article.content:
​

The U.S. Commercial Service​ is the trade promotion arm of the Department of Commerce's International Trade Administration. Through our global network of trade professionals located in nearly 80 countries and across the United States, we are working to strengthen the U.S. economy through trade, connecting U.S. companies with international buyers.

In addition to providing exporters with market intelligence, trade counseling, business matchmaking, and advocacy and commercial diplomacy, our experienced staff of International Trade Specialists will help you:

  • identify and evaluate qualified international partners
  • navigate international documentation challenges
  • create market entry strategies
  • other export related guidance

The U.S. Export Assistance Center located in Kansas City, MO is committed to assisting Missouri and Kansas firms located in the following counties in:

Missouri:Andrew, Atchison, Bates, Buchanan, Cass, Clay, Clinton, Henry, Holt, Jackson, Johnson, Lafayette, Nodaway, Platte, Ray, and St. Clair.

Kansas:Allen, Anderson, Atchison, Bourbon, Brown, Chase, Chautauqua, Cherokee, Coffey, Crawford, Doniphan, Douglas, Elk, Franklin, Geary, Greenwood, Jackson, Jefferson, Johnson, Labette, Leavenworth, Linn, Lyon, Marshall, Miami, Montgomery, Morris, Nemaha, Neosho, Osage, Pottawatomie, Riley, Shawnee, Wabaunsee, Wilson, Woodson, and Wyandotte.

For more information on how we can help your company succeed in the global marketplace, please visit ourservices page.
